Taiwan: Zheng Jing's forces under Liu Guoxuan attempt to conquer Zhangzhou but fail
Sweden: The Invasion of Rügen takes place.
Philippine: Juan de Vargas y Hurtado appointed Governor-General (1678–1684).
Italy: Antonio Vivaldi, a famous Italian Baroque composer, is born in Venice.
France: Treaties of Nijmegen: A series of treaties ending the Franco-Dutch war. France obtains the Franche-Comté and some cities in Flanders and Hainaut (from Spain).
